# FreeBusy

## Overview
- **Website:** https://freebusy.io
- **Category:** Meeting Scheduling & Calendar Integration Platform
- **Description:** FreeBusy is a comprehensive meeting scheduling platform that eliminates back-and-forth emails by allowing users to share their availability and let others book meetings directly. It integrates with multiple calendar providers and offers features like group scheduling, automated reminders, and video conferencing integration.
- **Status:** Active
- **Last Updated:** 2026-02-12

## Pricing Tiers

| Tier | Price (Monthly) | Price (Annual) | User Limit | Key Features |
|------|-----------------|----------------|------------|--------------|
| Personal | Free | Free | 1 user | Basic scheduling, 1 calendar |
| Professional | $4/month | ~$48/year | 1 user | Multiple calendars, integrations |
| Business | $12/month | ~$144/year | 1 user | Advanced features, team scheduling |
| Enterprise | Contact Us | Contact Us | Custom | Custom features, priority support |

### Notes on Pricing
- **Free tier available** - Personal plan is free
- **Professional:** $4 per user per month (per SaaSWorthy)
- **Business:** $12 per user per month (per SaaSWorthy)
- **Enterprise:** Custom pricing (Contact Us)
- **14-day free trial** available for Business plan
- **Volume discounts** available for Business plan
- **No setup fees** mentioned
- **Annual billing** available (discounts not specified)
- Pricing based on per registered user

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities (All Plans)
- **Meeting Scheduling**
  - One-click meeting scheduling
  - Availability sharing via personalized link
  - Automatic time zone detection
  - Buffer time between meetings
  - Meeting location (physical/virtual)
  - Customizable meeting types

- **Calendar Integration**
  - Google Calendar integration
  - Outlook/Exchange integration
  - Office 365 support
  - iCal support
  - Real-time sync
  - Conflict detection

- **Automation**
  - Automatic meeting reminders
  - Follow-up emails
  - Meeting rescheduling
  - Cancellation management
  - Custom email templates

### Professional Plan Features
- Multiple calendar connections
- Advanced booking rules
- Custom availability windows
- Group scheduling (multiple attendees)
- SMS notifications
- Meeting polls

### Business Plan Features
- Team scheduling
- Round-robin scheduling
- Collective availability
- Priority support
- Advanced analytics
- Custom branding
- Zapier integration

### Enterprise Plan Features
- Custom integrations
- Dedicated support
- SLA guarantees
- Advanced security
- Custom deployment options
- API access
- White-label options

## Add-On Products & Services

### Security & Compliance
- **Security Features**
  - End-to-end encryption
  - SOC 2 compliant infrastructure
  - GDPR compliant
  - HIPAA compliance available (Enterprise)
  - Data retention policies
  - Access controls

### Support & Training
- **Support Services**
  - Email support (all plans)
  - Priority support (Business+)
  - Dedicated account manager (Enterprise)
  - Onboarding assistance
  - Training resources

### Integrations & Extensions
- **Chrome Extension**
  - Free to install
  - Browser-based scheduling
  - Quick access to availability

## Integration Overview

**Total Integrations:** 15+ calendar and communication platforms

### Key Integrations Detailed

#### 1. Google Calendar / G-Suite
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Real-time sync of availability, automatic booking confirmation
- **Data synced:** Calendar events, availability, meeting details
- **Setup complexity:** Easy (OAuth connection)
- **Limitations:** Requires Google account
- **Documentation:** https://freebusy.io/en/google-calendar

#### 2. Microsoft Outlook / Office 365
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Connects Outlook calendar for scheduling
- **Data synced:** Calendar events, availability, contacts
- **Setup complexity:** Easy (Microsoft OAuth)
- **Limitations:** May require IT admin approval for enterprise
- **Documentation:** https://freebusy.io/en/outlook

#### 3. Zoom
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** One-way
- **What it does:** Automatically generates Zoom meeting links
- **Data synced:** Meeting links, join details
- **Setup complexity:** Easy (API key connection)
- **Limitations:** Requires Zoom account
- **Documentation:** https://help.freebusy.io/en/articles/5585922-zoom-integration

#### 4. Salesforce
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Syncs meeting data with Salesforce CRM
- **Data synced:** Meeting outcomes, attendee details, follow-up tasks
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (Salesforce connection)
- **Limitations:** Requires Salesforce account with API access
- **Documentation:** https://help.freebusy.io/en/articles/5585923-salesforce-integration

#### 5. Greenhouse
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** One-way
- **What it does:** Scheduling for recruitment interviews
- **Data synced:** Candidate details, interview schedules
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (Greenhouse API)
- **Limitations:** Requires Greenhouse account
- **Documentation:** https://help.freebusy.io/en/articles/5585924-greenhouse-integration

#### 6. HubSpot
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Syncs meeting data with HubSpot CRM
- **Data synced:** Meeting outcomes, contact details, notes
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (HubSpot OAuth)
- **Limitations:** Requires HubSpot account
- **Documentation:** https://help.freebusy.io/en/articles/5585925-hubspot-integration

#### 7. Intercom
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** One-way
- **What it does:** Scheduling for customer support and sales
- **Data synced:** Customer data, meeting requests
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (Intercom API)
- **Limitations:** Requires Intercom account
- **Documentation:** https://help.freebusy.io/en/articles/5585926-intercom-integration

#### 8. Chrome Extension
- **Type:** Browser Extension
- **Direction:** One-way
- **What it does:** Quick scheduling from browser
- **Data synced:** Availability, meeting links
- **Setup complexity:** Easy (Chrome Web Store)
- **Limitations:** Chrome browser only
- **Documentation:** https://freebusy.io/en/chrome

## Integration Types Available
- **Native Integrations:** Direct API connections to platforms
- **Browser Extensions:** Chrome extension for quick access
- **API Access:** Available for Enterprise plan
- **Zapier Integration:** Available for Business+ plans
- **Webhooks:** Available (Enterprise)

## Integration Categories
- **Calendar Systems:** Google, Outlook, Office 365, iCal
- **CRM Systems:** Salesforce, HubSpot, Intercom
- **Video Conferencing:** Zoom, Google Meet, Teams
- **Recruiting:** Greenhouse
- **Communication:** Email, SMS
- **Productivity:** Zapier, Chrome extension

## API & Developer Info

### API Availability
- **API Access:** Yes (Enterprise plan)
- **API Documentation:** https://freebusy.io/en/developers
- **API Reference:** https://freebusy.io/en/developers/api
- **Authentication:** OAuth 2.0
- **Rate Limits:** Not publicly specified (contact for details)

### Developer Resources
- **Developer Portal:** https://freebusy.io/en/developers
- **API Documentation:** Available via developer portal
- **Webhooks:** Available (Enterprise)
- **SDK:** Not available
- **Integration Guidelines:** Available

### API Features
- Meeting scheduling endpoints
- Availability lookup endpoints
- Calendar synchronization
- User management endpoints
- Webhook support for events

## Evaluation Notes

### Pros (5+ items)
1. **Free tier available** - Personal plan is free for basic use
2. **Wide calendar support** - Google, Outlook, Office 365, iCal
3. **Easy integration** - Simple OAuth setup for most platforms
4. **Group scheduling** - Multiple attendee scheduling capability
5. **Automated reminders** - Reduces no-shows
6. **Video conferencing integration** - Zoom, Google Meet support
7. **Zapier integration** - Connect to 5000+ apps (Business+)

### Cons (4+ items)
1. **Limited public pricing** - Enterprise pricing not transparent
2. **No mobile app** - No native iOS/Android apps
3. **Limited customization** - Basic branding options
4. **No phone support** - Email only support
5. **Enterprise features require contact** - No self-service enterprise signup
6. **Limited API access** - Only available on Enterprise plan

### Alternatives
- **Calendly** - More popular, similar features
- **Acuity Scheduling** - More advanced for businesses
- **Chili Piper** - Sales-focused scheduling
- **OnceHub** - More customization options
- **ScheduleOnce** - More enterprise features

### Use Cases

**Ideal For:**
- Individuals and small teams needing simple scheduling
- Freelancers and consultants
- Sales teams needing basic scheduling
- Teams using Google Workspace or Microsoft 365
- Companies wanting free tier for basic use

**Not Ideal For:**
- Large enterprises needing advanced security
- Teams requiring native mobile apps
- Organizations needing phone support
- Companies requiring extensive customization
- Teams needing advanced API integrations

### Key Differentiators (5 items)
1. **Free tier** - Competitively priced with free option
2. **Multiple calendar support** - Works with major providers
3. **Group scheduling** - Built-in multi-attendee scheduling
4. **Video conferencing integration** - Automatic meeting links
5. **Zapier integration** - Connect to other business tools

4. **API access limited:** Only available on Enterprise plan
5. **Support options:** Limited to email only

1. Request Enterprise pricing directly from sales
2. Test free tier to evaluate basic functionality
3. Check Zapier integration for additional workflow automation

5. Review security documentation for compliance needs
